original_text: My body is not there with you, but my spirit is with you. It seems like I am present with you. So I have already decided about this man. This is how you should punish him for what he has done.
korean_text: 내가 실로 몸으로는 떠나 있으나 영으로는 함께 있어서 거기 있는 것 같이 이런 일 행한 자를 이미 판단하였노라

sentences.original_text: My body is not there with you
sentences.korean_translation: 내 육체는 너희와 함께 있지 않지만

sentences.original_text: but my spirit is with you
It seems like I am present with you
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 내가 너희와 함께 있는 것 같다

sentences.original_text: So I have already decided about this man
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 나는 이미 이 사람에 대해 결정했다

sentences.original_text: This is how you should punish him
sentences.korean_translation: 이것이 너희가 그를 벌해야 하는 방법이다
